getRepresentativeTags

public static java.util.ArrayList getRepresentativeTags(java.util.Map imagesTags,
                                                        int percentage)
This functions returns, given a minimum reference count of at least MIN_REFERENCE_TAG_COUNT but of a percentage of REFERENCE_TAG_PERCENTAGE (can be set above) if higher, the set of representative tags as an array list from a map with the imageid => tags (string => string list)

Parameters:
imagesTags - Map with all the images and their corresponding tags
percentage - Minimum percentage, to set in REFERENCE_TAG_PERCENTAGE
Returns:
ArrayList

imageTagsFromFile

public static java.util.Map imageTagsFromFile(java.lang.String fileName)
Creates a map vom the information giving in a *.cvs file located in the /res folder (string => string list), using the first cell of a row as identifier. If a file can't be read, make sure that you are using the right path.

Parameters:
fileName - Input path for *.cvs file
Returns:
Map

mapFromDatabase

public static java.util.Map mapFromDatabase(java.lang.String url,
                                            java.lang.String user,
                                            java.lang.String password)
Establishes a database connection (to a postgres database) and saves all image ids and their corresponding tags to a map (string => string list). Please add an appropriate postgresql-driver that coposrresponds to your version of the JVM to the build path.

Parameters:
url - URL to the database
user - Username for the database
password - Password for the database
Returns:
void

Parameters:
theMatrix - A matrix returned by calculcateDistanceMatrix

map - URL to the database

writeDistanceMatrixIntoFile

public static int writeDistanceMatrixIntoFile(double[][] theMatrix)
Writes a distance matrix calculated by calculcateDistanceMatrix into a file named "distances.cvs" in the *.cvs-format.

Parameters:
theMatrix - A matrix returned by calculcateDistanceMatrix
Returns:
int
